Key_Features: Gyroscope, enhanced accelerometer, GNSS module (GPS+GLONASS), improved OTA updates
Notes: Supports new vehicle makes/models including EVs

Key_Features: GO9 functionality + on-board Wi-Fi hotspot, Multi-device support
Notes: Wi-Fi can stay active hours after engine off

Key_Features: In-vehicle alerts, engine diagnostics, trip memory, accident data recording, accessory expansion port

Notes: For backup communication outside cellular coverage

Key_Features: Web-based platform, 4 feature packages (Base, Regulatory, Pro, ProPlus)
GPS location, VIN, Driver ID, basic IOX support
Base features + HOS, IFTA, temperature monitoring
Regulatory features + engine data, accelerometer data, fuel management, advanced driver coaching
Greatest functionality including Active Tracking, lifetime warranty, advanced IOX, premium services, EV data
ELD compliance, DVIR, Driver ID, Messaging, additional functionality
Add-ons for integration with third-party providers
Notes: Each IOX performs simple task and relays info to/from GO device

column6: Largest single-source telematics contract to date
